verses.kjv: I lifted up mine eyes again, and looked, and behold a man with a measuring line in his hand.
verses.web: I lifted up my eyes, and saw, and behold, a man with a measuring line in his hand.
verses.ct: I looked up again and saw a man holding a measuring line in his hand.

verses.kjv: Then said I, Whither goest thou? And he said unto me, To measure Jerusalem, to see what is the breadth thereof, and what is the length thereof.
verses.web: Then I asked, “Where are you going?” He said to me, “To measure Jerusalem, to see what is its width and what is its length.”
verses.ct: I asked him, "Where are you going?" He answered, "To measure Jerusalem — to find out how wide and how long it is."

verses.kjv: And, behold, the angel that talked with me went forth, and another angel went out to meet him,
verses.web: Behold, the angel who talked with me went out, and another angel went out to meet him,
verses.ct: Then the angel who had been speaking with me went out, and another angel came out to meet him.

verses.kjv: And said unto him, Run, speak to this young man, saying, Jerusalem shall be inhabited as towns without walls for the multitude of men and cattle therein:
verses.web: and said to him, “Run, speak to this young man, saying, ‘Jerusalem will be inhabited as villages without walls, because of the multitude of men and livestock in it.
verses.ct: The second angel told him, "Run and tell that young man this: 'Jerusalem will be so full of people and livestock that it will spread out like an unwalled village — too large for walls to contain.'

verses.kjv: For I, saith the LORD, will be unto her a wall of fire round about, and will be the glory in the midst of her.
verses.web: For I,’ says LORD, ‘will be to her a wall of fire around it, and I will be the glory in the middle of her.
verses.ct: "'For I myself,' declares the LORD, 'will be a wall of fire surrounding her, and I will be the glory within her.'

verses.kjv: Ho, ho, come forth, and flee from the land of the north, saith the LORD: for I have spread you abroad as the four winds of the heaven, saith the LORD.
verses.web: Come! Come! Flee from the land of the north,’ says LORD; ‘for I have spread you abroad as the four winds of the sky,’ says LORD.
verses.ct: "'Come! Come! Flee from the land of the north,' declares the LORD, 'for I scattered you to the 4 winds of the heavens,' says the LORD.

verses.kjv: Deliver thyself, O Zion, that dwellest with the daughter of Babylon.
verses.web: ‘Come, Zion! Escape, you who dwell with the daughter of Babylon.’
verses.ct: "'Escape, Zion! You who are living among the people of Babylon — get out now!'

verses.kjv: For thus saith the LORD of hosts; After the glory hath he sent me unto the nations which spoiled you: for he that toucheth you toucheth the apple of his eye.
verses.web: For LORD of Armies says: ‘For honor he has sent me to the nations which plundered you; for he who touches you touches the apple of his eye.
verses.ct: For the LORD of hosts says this: 'After glory sent me to the nations that plundered you — because whoever touches you touches the apple of his eye —

verses.kjv: For, behold, I will shake mine hand upon them, and they shall be a spoil to their servants: and ye shall know that the LORD of hosts hath sent me.
verses.web: For, behold, I will shake my hand over them, and they will be a plunder to those who served them; and you will know that LORD of Armies has sent me.
verses.ct: I will raise my hand against them, and their own slaves will plunder them.' Then you will know that the LORD of hosts has sent me.

verses.kjv: Sing and rejoice, O daughter of Zion: for, lo, I come, and I will dwell in the midst of thee, saith the LORD.
verses.web: Sing and rejoice, daughter of Zion; for, behold, I come, and I will dwell within you,’ says LORD.
verses.ct: "Sing and celebrate, daughter of Zion! For look — I am coming, and I will live among you," declares the LORD.

verses.kjv: And many nations shall be joined to the LORD in that day, and shall be my people: and I will dwell in the midst of thee, and thou shalt know that the LORD of hosts hath sent me unto thee.
verses.web: Many nations shall join themselves to LORD in that day, and shall be my people; and I will dwell among you, and you shall know that LORD of Armies has sent me to you.
verses.ct: "On that day, many nations will join themselves to the LORD and become my people. I will live among you, and you will know that the LORD of hosts has sent me to you.

verses.kjv: And the LORD shall inherit Judah his portion in the holy land, and shall choose Jerusalem again.
verses.web: LORD will inherit Judah as his portion in the holy land, and will again choose Jerusalem.
verses.ct: The LORD will claim Judah as his own portion in the holy land, and he will once again choose Jerusalem as his own.

verses.kjv: Be silent, O all flesh, before the LORD: for he is raised up out of his holy habitation.
verses.web: Be silent, all flesh, before LORD; for he has roused himself from his holy habitation!”
verses.ct: Let everyone on earth be silent before the LORD, for he has risen from his holy dwelling place."
